timeline.message:
Merge pull request #1 from primefaces/master

update to latest

https://github.com/primefaces/primefaces/issues/5989

Update Hazelcast to version 4.0

Effects
--------

Min JDK version to 8
Payara web interfaces will need to follow upgrade procedures for versions 4 and below

https://github.com/primefaces/primefaces/issues/5989

Update Hazelcast to version 4.0.1

Effects
--------

Min JDK version to 8
Payara web interfaces will need to follow upgrade procedures for versions 4 and below

timeline.bodyText: We typically don't format files in PR's. Can you make this PR just the bare minimum changes?
timeline.author: melloware
